warning.selectArtboard: Please select at least one artboard
warning.noProjects: Looks like there's no project to select. Make sure you've created one or request manager access to the necessary project on Crowdin
warning.noStrings: Make sure the source files are uploaded to the Crowdin project. Once this is done, the text strings will appear here
warning.authorizationError: You don't have enough permissions to perform this action
warning.authenticationError: Unable to authorize. Please, use another Personal Access Token and try again.
warning.generatedPageCannotBeTranslated: This translated page was generated by Crowdin. Select the source page to send texts for translation
warning.generatedArtboardCannotBeTranslated: This translated artboard was generated by Crowdin. Select the source page to send texts for translation
warning.noTranslationsForPage: There are no translations for the %name% page
warning.pleaseSelectArtboards: Select at least one artboard with the linked strings to upload screenshots
warning.noLinkedStrings: There are no linked strings to the selected artboards. No screenshots were uploaded

info.stringsUploadedToCrowdin: Strings were successfully pushed to Crowdin. You can now either pre-translate them via Machine Translation engines or invite translators to your Crowdin project
info.updatingExistingFileForArtboard: Updating existing source file for this artboard on Crowdin
info.creatingNewFileForArtboard: Creating a new source file for the %name% artboard on Crowdin
info.updatingExistingFileForPage: Updating existing source file for the %name% page on Crowdin
info.creatingNewFileForPage: Creating a new source file for the %name% page on Crowdin
info.screenshotsUploadedToCrowdin: Screenshots were successfully pushed to Crowdin
info.screenshotUploadedToCrowdin: Screenshot for the %name% artboard successfully pushed to Crowdin
info.addingTagsToScreenshot: Adding tags to screenshot for the %name% artboard

labels.tokenDetailsText: You can generate it in your Crowdin Account Settings
labels.overrideTranslationsText: Override existing translated pages and artboards and keep only the latest version for each language
labels.contentSegmentationText: Defines whether to split long texts into smaller text segments when sending texts to Crowdin
labels.stringsKeyNamingText: Pattern which will be used to autocomplete string identifier if it was added from design
labels.branchText: Specify the branch for content synchronization. Work on branches to localize different product versions
labels.organizationDetailsText: Fill in your organization domain name (for Crowdin Enterprise only)
labels.useStringDetailsText: Create clear multilingual user interfaces. Prototype with the real copy, send new strings for translation with the keys and screenshots. Preview translated mockups with the strings you’ve used.
labels.addStringLinkDuplicateLabel: Link new duplicate texts to a single Crowdin string
labels.previewStringsDetailsText: Preview translations from Crowdin for strings used in the designs
labels.uploadScreenshotsDetailsText: Send screenshots of the artboards within the selected page with the tagged source strings you've used
labels.pseudoLocalizationLengthCorrectionText: Allows you to make strings longer or shorter to see whether your product's UI properly handles other languages. As translations in some languages can be longer or shorter than the source texts in your project.
labels.pseudoLocalizationPrefixSuffixText: Allows you to add special characters at the beginning and end of each string.
labels.pseudoLocalizationCharacterTransformatio: Are foreign language character sets displayed correctly in your application? Character Transformation replaces English characters with easily identifiable accented versions, random Arabic symbols, or Chinese ideographs to make it obvious if there are some hard-coded strings in your application. This ensures that your application is ready to be localized into other languages (including right-to-left and left-to-right ones).

details.translationsDetails: Generate multi-language creative assets like banners or social media graphics. Send designs for translation and upload translated copies back.
details.stringsDetails: Streamline UI localization. Get real texts from Crowdin and update source files with the new strings. Send screenshots for translators’ reference and preview the translated versions in Sketch.
details.addStringStringDetails: Fill in text string you'd like to add to the Crowdin project
details.addStringIdentifierDetails: A unique identifier of this string. It helps to match source and translated texts in your application
details.addStringMaxLengthDetails: The maximum length of the translated text (0 — unlimited)
details.addStringContextDetails: Any contextual information that will help translators to understand the source text meaning
details.addStringFileDetails: Select an editable source file from the Crowdin project. You can add source strings only to existing files. Supported formats: CSV, RESX, JSON, Android XML, iOS strings, PROPERTIES, XLIFF, ARB.
details.addStringLabelDetails: Specify labels for string(s) which then will be used in search or export functionality
details.pseudoLocalizationDetails: Pseudo-localization is a way to test the readiness of the application to be translated. This process imitates how the application's UI will look with different languages and thus allows you to check whether the source strings should be modified before the project localization.

validation.addStringEmptyIdentifier: Fill in the identifier for the source string
validation.addStringEmptyContext: Fill in the context for the source string
validation.addStringInvalidMaxLength: Max length should be zero or positive integer
validation.addStringEmptyFile: Source strings adding is available for
validation.artboardNotSelected: Please select at least one artboard
validation.editStringNoLinks: This string is not linked to any text in the design.

custom.stringFilesSelectPlaceholder: Select one or more source files
